name: Pedro na ostrove piratov
overview: World traveler Pedro finds himself in a difficult situation during his travels - while exploring a deserted island, he discovers a pirate base. The pirates, fearing disclosure, imprison Pedro and leave him to rot in the farthest corner of the cave for seven long years. One day, however, an exceptional chance to escape appears - most of the crew sets out to rob and only a few individuals remain at the base, while one drunkard drops the cell key from his pocket...
